And they gave that love back to Spencer and others.

title: Our Spencer
text:
Career
Spencer Irvine was a Senior Writer & Researcher at Americans for Fair Treatment, a community of current and former public-sector employees offering resources and support to exercise their First Amendment rights

title: Our Spencer
text:
He understood and taught principles
Our beloved husband, son, brother, uncle Spencer Reed Irvine.
Spencer is survived by his love of life Meg Irvine Nunez, loving parents Don and Young, siblings Kristy (Tyler) and Steven (Bree).
